author: wmtan
body:
Recent PR #10858 implemented a fix to avoid updating HepMCProduct in place. Backward compatibility was implemented by updating file Configuration/StandardSequences/python/Digi_cff.py.
However, workflows using premixed pileup with the data mixing module do not use Digi_cff.py.
They use DigiDMPreMix_cff.py instead. This PR implements backward compatibility in that file, thereby fixing the 14 DataMixer relvals that now fail in recycling mode.
title: Add HepMCProduct backward compatibility for premixing
